sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE167520 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CRDC_SEIL_NUM , CLUT_SEPT_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #yrtxBlggYr# , (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM YE167520) , #clutSeptCd# , #nnfCl# , #suptFmlyRltCl# , #suptFmlyFnm# , #suptFmlyBhdt# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #dataCd# , #crdcUseAmtSum# , #crdcUseAmt# , #cshptUseAmt# , #drtpCardUseAmt# , #tdmrUseAmt# , #etcUseAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE167520 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CRDC_SEIL_NUM=#crdcSeilNum# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , NNF_CL=#nnfCl# , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL=#suptFmlyRltCl# , SUPT_FMLY_FNM=#suptFmlyFnm# , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT=#suptFmlyBhdt# , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# , DATA_CD=#dataCd# , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM=#crdcUseAmtSum# , CRDC_USE_AMT=#crdcUseAmt# , CSHPT_USE_AMT=#cshptUseAmt# , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT=#drtpCardUseAmt# , TDMR_USE_AMT=#tdmrUseAmt# , ETC_USE_AMT=#etcUseAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CRDC_SEIL_NUM=#crdcSeilNum# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE167520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CRDC_SEIL_NUM , CLUT_SEPT_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167520 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CRDC_SEIL_NUM=#crdcSeilNum# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CRDC_SEIL_NUM , CLUT_SEPT_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE167520 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CRDC_SEIL_NUM DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE167520 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
